Text: Yvonne Ridley:  She is a vocal supporter of Palestine, a cause she took up as a schoolgirl and is also a critic of the political ideology of Zionism and vocal critic of Western media portrayals and foreign policy in the War on Terror, and has undertaken speaking tours throughout the Muslim world as well as America, Europe and Australia.
